title: GSML
description: <font color="#4f81bd">GSML</font> is a collection class grouping a set of features or types which are members of this collection.  A <font color="#4f81bd">collectionType</font> property provides context or purpose.

collectionType.title: collectionType
collectionType.description: The <font color="#4f81bd">collectionType:CollectionTypeTerm</font> property contains a term from a controlled vocabulary describing the type of collection, such as Geologic Map, Boreholes, 3D models.

member-1.earthMaterialItem.title: earthMaterialItem
member-1.earthMaterialItem.description: The earthMaterialItem attribute is a placeholder for the EarthMaterial class that is included as a member of a GSML Collection.

member-1.featureItem.title: featureItem
member-1.featureItem.description: The featureItem attribute is a placeholder for the GeologicFeature class that is included as a member of a GSML Collection.

member-1.mappedItem.title: mappedItem
member-1.mappedItem.description: The mappedItem attribute is a placeholder for the MappedFeature class that is included as a member of a GSML Collection.

member-1.relationItem.title: relationItem
member-1.relationItem.description: The relationItem attribute is a placeholder for the GeologicRelation class that is included as a member of a GSML Collection.

member-1.samplingFeatureItem.title: samplingFeatureItem
member-1.samplingFeatureItem.description: The samplingFeatureItem attribute is a placeholder for the SamplingFeature class that is included as a member of a GSML Collection.
